clinical_study.brief_title: The Effects of Sodium and Potassium on Blood Pressure, Vascular Function and Renal Function
clinical_study.official_title: Study on the Effects of Sodium and Potassium on Blood Pressure, Vascular Function and Renal Function in Untreated (Pre)Hypertensive Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: To determine the effect of (1) increased sodium intake and (2) increased potassium intake on blood pressure, vascular function and renal function in untreated (pre)hypertensive subjects.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a randomized, double-blind, placebo controlled cross-over feeding study.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Endothelium-dependent flow-mediated dilation comparing (1) high sodium, low potassium intake and (2) low sodium, high potassium intake with low sodium, low potassium intake.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline at week 1 (t=0). After intervention period 1 at week 5 (t=1). After intervention period 2 at week 9 (t=2). After intervention period 3 at week 13 (t=3)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in blood pressure comparing (1) high sodium, low potassium intake and (2) low sodium, high potassium intake with low sodium, low potassium intake.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Screening. Baseline at week 1 (t=0). After intervention period 1 at week 5 (t=1). After intervention period 2 at week 9 (t=2). After intervention period 3 at week 13 (t=3)
secondary_outcome.description: Includes: Office BP (Dinamap, 4 consecutive measurements with 2-min intervals) ABPM (Spacelab; 1x24h, at baseline, week 5, week 9, week 13)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Pulse Wave Velocity comparing (1) high sodium, low potassium intake and (2) low sodium, high potassium intake with low sodium, low potassium intake.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline at week 1 (t=0). After intervention period 1 at week 5 (t=1). After intervention period 2 at week 9 (t=2). After intervention period 3 at week 13 (t=3)
secondary_outcome.description: Device: SphygmoCor (tonometry) Parameters: Pulse Wave Velocity and at baseline, week 5, week 9 and week 13

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in vasomotion comparing (1) high sodium, low potassium intake and (2) low sodium, high potassium intake with low sodium, low potassium intake.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline at week 1 (t=0). After intervention period 1 at week 5 (t=1). After intervention period 2 at week 9 (t=2). After intervention period 3 at week 13 (t=3)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Biomarkers of endothelial function comparing (1) high sodium, low potassium intake and (2) low sodium, high potassium intake with low sodium, low potassium intake.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline at week 1 (t=0). After intervention period 1 at week 5 (t=1). After intervention period 2 at week 9 (t=2). After intervention period 3 at week 13 (t=3)
secondary_outcome.description: Plasma analysis of endothelin-1, ADMA, MCP-1, sVCAM-1, sICAM-1, sE-selectin, sTM, CRP, SAA, IL-6, IL-8, TNF-α, vWF, nitric oxide

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in renal function comparing (1) high sodium, low potassium intake and (2) low sodium, high potassium intake with low sodium, low potassium intake.

secondary_outcome.description: Total cholesterol, HDL-cholesterol, LDL-cholesterol, triglycerides, insulin and glucose (at screening also used as safety parameter)

secondary_outcome.description: Montoring liver function parameters for safety: includes ALAT, ASAT and ɣ-GT

arm_group.description: For 4 weeks subjects will consume 3 grams of sodium by the intake of capsules on top of a low-sodium (2 grams of sodium), low-potassium (2 grams of potassium) diet
For 4 weeks subjects will consume 3 grams of potassium by the intake of capsules on top of a low-sodium (2 grams of sodium), low-potassium (2 grams of potassium) diet.
For 4 weeks subjects will consume placebo capsules (content: cellulose) on top of a low-sodium low-potassium diet

intervention.description: Sodium Chloride (provided by Microz, Geleen, Netherlands): 8 capsules per day which equals a sodium intake of 3 grams.
Potassium Chloride (provided by Microz, Geleen, Netherlands): 8 capsules per day which equals a potassium intake of 3 grams.
Placebo (cellulose, provided by Microz, Geleen, Netherlands): 8 capsules per day.
